HotelRoom.RoomTypeName: Classic Room, 1 Double Or 2 Twin Beds (With Spa Access),Nonsmoking

RoomAdditionalInfo.Description:
215 sq feet


Internet - Free WiFi and wired Internet access

Entertainment - 40-inch LCD TV with satellite channels

Food and Drink - Coffee/tea maker, minibar, electric kettle, and 24-hour room service

Sleep - Select Comfort bed, premium bedding, blackout drapes/curtains, turndown service, and bed sheets

Bathroom - Private bathroom, bathrobes, and a bathtub or shower with a rainfall showerhead

Practical - Laptop-compatible safe, desk, and phone

Comfort - Daily housekeeping and climate-controlled heating and air conditioning

Accessibility - Low-height counters and sink, bathroom emergency pull cord, raised toilet seat, grab bar near toilet, and wheelchair accessible

Need to Know - No cribs (infant beds) available

Non-Smoking

Room/bed type depends on availability at check-in

Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability
